summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 6, 2019. It details routine operations, staff leave, inmate counts, and notably records Jeffrey Epstein as a new admission to the facility under his inmate number, shortly before his death.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a new admission to MCC New York under inmate number #76318-054 on this daily activity report.

events.title: Epstein admitted to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York as a new inmate.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) is listed as a 'NEW ADMISSION TO MCC New York' on July 6, 2019.
The report indicates an inmate was at a local hospital under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
The facility reported staff shortages leading to the vacating of certain correctional assignments (10 South, SHU #2).
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning shift on July 6, 2019, was 789.
This is an official government memorandum from the MCC's operations, documenting routine and administrative details.
